parameters.name: Account
parameters.description: The username of the account that is used for the LDAP server.

parameters.name: EmailMapping
parameters.description: The field that is used to indicate the email address of a user on the LDAP server.

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: The condition that is used to filter users.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the bastion host. You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the ID of the bastion host.

parameters.name: IsSSL
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to support SSL. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: LoginNameMapping
parameters.description: The field that is used to indicate the logon name of a user on the LDAP server.

parameters.name: MobileMapping
parameters.description: The field that is used to indicate the mobile phone number of a user on the LDAP server.

parameters.name: NameMapping
parameters.description: The field that is used to indicate the name of a user on the LDAP server.

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The password of the account that is used for the LDAP server. You must configure a password when you configure LDAP authentication. If you leave this parameter empty when you modify the settings of LDAP authentication, the current password is used.

parameters.name: Port
parameters.description: The port that is used to access the LDAP server.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the bastion host. For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).

parameters.name: Server
parameters.description: The address of the LDAP server.

parameters.name: StandbyServer
parameters.description: The address of the secondary LDAP server.
